example.name: transitive
example.text: Yutaka Kawashima also suggested that the Universe Development Undertaking Group organize an inspection team [*] to thoroughly ascertain the reason why the satellite could not enter geosynchronous orbit [*T*-15] .
example.arg: the reason why the satellite could not enter geosynchronous orbit [*T*-15]
